roleset.name: to have reference, relate
roleset.note: PERTAIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'pertain' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from pertain.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: However , it gave the shareholders the right [*] to pursue a small portion of their claim that [*T*-1]pertains to Lisa 's disk drive , known [*] as Twiggy .
example.arg: to Lisa 's disk drive , known [*] as Twiggy
